hook: [curious] What if I told you that Queen Victoria, the epitome of Victorian decorum, harbored a secret love affair? While the world knew her as a devoted wife to Prince Albert, behind the palace walls, a passionate relationship blossomed with one of her trusted servants, John Brown.
description: Discover the secret love affair of Queen Victoria and her trusted servant, John Brown. #QueenVictoria #HistorySecrets #LoveAffair
